description: Draw a debug line on screen.

params.name: start
description: Start vector position of the line.

params.name: end
description: End vector position of the line.

params.name: color
description: RGB color of the line in a vector, defaults to white.

params.name: depthTest
description: Whether to only draw the line when it is in front of objects, defaults to false. Depth test is only supported on pc.

params.name: duration
description: How many server frames the line should persist through.
